mapper.insert: insert into RD_DOZN_HISTORY (TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO, URL, SEND_LONGTXT) values(#{tranDay}, #{telegramNo}, #{url}, #{sendLongtxt})

INSERT INTO RD_DOZN_DS (DS_DT, DS_TM, PAYMENT_SUCC_CNT, PAYMENT_SUCC_AMOUNT, PAYMENT_FAIL_CNT, PAYMENT_FAIL_AMOUNT, DEPOSITOR_SUCC_CNT, DEPOSITOR_TIME_CNT, DEPOSITOR_FAIL_CNT) VALUES(#{dsDt}, #{dsTm}, #{paymentSuccCnt}, #{paymentSuccAmount}, #{paymentFailCnt}, #{paymentFailAmount}, #{depositorSuccCnt}, #{depositorTimeCnt}, #{depositorFailCnt})
mapper.update: UPDATE RD_DOZN_DS a, (SELECT tran_day, SUM(if(STATUS=200, 1, 0)) DAON_SUCC_CNT, SUM(if(STATUS=200, amount, 0)) DAON_SUCC_AMOUNT , SUM(if(STATUS!=200 OR STATUS IS null, 1, 0)) DAON_FAIL_CNT , SUM(if(STATUS!=200 OR STATUS IS null, amount, 0)) DAON_FAIL_AMOUNT FROM RD_TRANSFER WHERE tran_day = #{dsDt} GROUP BY tran_day) b SET a.DAON_SUCC_CNT = nvl(b.DAON_SUCC_CNT, 0) , a.DAON_SUCC_AMOUNT = nvl(b.DAON_SUCC_AMOUNT, 0) , a.DAON_FAIL_CNT = nvl(b.DAON_FAIL_CNT, 0) , a.DAON_FAIL_AMOUNT = nvl(b.DAON_FAIL_AMOUNT, 0) WHERE a.DS_DT = #{dsDt} and a.DS_TM = #{dsTm}
mapper.select: SELECT DS_DT, DS_TM, PAYMENT_SUCC_CNT, PAYMENT_SUCC_AMOUNT, PAYMENT_FAIL_CNT, PAYMENT_FAIL_AMOUNT, DEPOSITOR_SUCC_CNT, DEPOSITOR_TIME_CNT, DEPOSITOR_FAIL_CNT , DAON_SUCC_CNT, DAON_SUCC_AMOUNT, DAON_FAIL_CNT, DAON_FAIL_AMOUNT, CREAT_DT FROM RD_DOZN_DS WHERE 1=1 AND DS_DT BETWEEN #{searchFromDate} and #{searchToDate} ORDER BY DS_DT DESC ;

SELECT tab.cooperator_id, tab.cooperator_nm , SUM(day_plus) - SUM(day_minus) - CEILING(SUM(day_plus)*nvl(a.FEE_ADMINSTRATOR*0.01, 0)) AS DAY_ABLE_PRICE , SUM(week_plus) - SUM(week_minus) AS WEEK_ABLE_PRICE , a.FEE_ADMINSTRATOR, a.FEE_ID FROM ( SELECT aa.cooperator_id, aa.cooperator_nm ,sum(if(a.week_yn ='N', if(a.gubun = 'C' OR a.gubun = 'E' OR a.gubun = 'B' OR a.gubun = 'O' OR (a.gubun = 'D' AND c.status_cd = '0000' AND c.STATUS = '200'), cost, 0), 0)) day_plus /*선지급금은 이체완료건만 산정*/ ,sum(if(a.week_yn ='Y', if(a.gubun = 'C' OR a.gubun = 'E' OR a.gubun = 'B' OR a.gubun = 'O' OR (a.gubun = 'D' AND c.status_cd = '0000' AND c.STATUS = '200'), cost, 0), 0)) week_plus /*선지급금은 이체완료건만 산정*/ , 0 day_minus , 0 week_minus FROM RD_COOPERATOR aa left join RD_COOPERATOR_PROFIT a ON aa.cooperator_id = a.cooperator_id LEFT JOIN RD_DAY_PAY b ON a.DYP_ID = b.DYP_ID AND b.USE_AT ='Y' LEFT JOIN RD_TRANSFER c ON b.TRAN_DAY = c.TRAN_DAY AND b.TELEGRAM_NO = c.TELEGRAM_NO WHERE 1=1 AND aa.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND aa.COOPERATOR_ID IN ( SELECT COOPERATOR_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR sub_a WHERE sub_a.REGISTRATION_SN = #{schIhidNum} AND use_at ='Y' )
AND aa.COOPERATOR_ID = #{searchCooperatorId}
GROUP BY aa.cooperator_id
UNION all
SELECT aa.cooperator_id, aa.cooperator_nm , 0 day_plus , 0 week_plus , nvl(sum(if(week_yn ='N', a.send_fee+a.send_price, 0)), 0) day_minus , nvl(sum(if(week_yn ='Y', a.send_fee+a.send_price+day_fee, 0)), 0) week_minus FROM RD_COOPERATOR aa left join RD_COOPERATOR_PAY a ON aa.cooperator_id = a.cooperator_id AND a.USE_AT ='Y' WHERE 1=1 AND aa.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND aa.COOPERATOR_ID IN ( SELECT COOPERATOR_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR sub_a WHERE sub_a.REGISTRATION_SN = #{schIhidNum} AND use_at ='Y' )
AND aa.COOPERATOR_ID = #{searchCooperatorId}
GROUP BY aa.cooperator_id ) tab LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_FEE a ON tab.COOPERATOR_ID = a.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.use_at ='Y' GROUP by cooperator_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RD_COOPERATOR_PAY (COP_ID, COOPERATOR_ID, DAY_FEE, SEND_FEE, SEND_PRICE, TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO, USE_AT, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID) VALUES(#{copId}, #{cooperatorId}, #{dayFee}, #{sendFee}, #{sendPrice}, #{tranDay}, #{telegramNo}, #{useAt}, SYSDATE(), #{creatId})
mapper.update: UPDATE RD_COOPERATOR_PAY set USE_AT = 'N' WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} AND USE_AT ='Y'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RD_BALNCE WHERE (COOPERATOR_ID, MBER_ID) IN ( SELECT COOPERATOR_ID, #{cooperatorMberId} AS MBER_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR_PAY WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} AND USE_AT ='Y' ) FOR UPDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE RD_BALNCE a, ( SELECT COOPERATOR_ID, #{cooperatorMberId} AS MBER_ID, SEND_FEE+SEND_PRICE AS SUM_COST from RD_COOPERATOR_PAY WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} AND USE_AT ='Y' )b SET BALANCE0 = BALANCE0 + SUM_COST WHERE a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.MBER_ID = b.MBER_ID
mapper.select: SELECT a.COOPERATOR_ID, COOPERATOR_NM, REGISTRATION_SN, COMPANY_NM, REGISTRATION_NM, CEO_NM, a.USE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(b.CREAT_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS CREAT_DT, a.CREAT_ID, 'R' GUBUN , cp.FEE_ID, FEE_ADMINSTRATOR, FEE_COOPERATOR, FEE_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE, FEE_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE, FEE_WITHHOLDING_TAX, FEE_TIME_INSURANCE, FEE_CALL, FEE_COOPERATOR_CALL, FEE_PROGRAM FROM RD_PROFIT cp left join RD_COOPERATOR a ON cp.COOPERATOR_ID = a.COOPERATOR_ID LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_FEE b ON cp.fee_id = b.fee_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND cp.profit_id = #{profitId}

SELECT usr.mber_id, usr.mber_nm, usr.MBTLNUM , NVL(fee.FEE_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE, b.FEE_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE) AS FEE_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE , NVL(fee.FEE_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE, b.FEE_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE) AS FEE_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE , NVL(fee.FEE_WITHHOLDING_TAX, b.FEE_WITHHOLDING_TAX) AS FEE_WITHHOLDING_TAX , NVL(fee.FEE_TIME_INSURANCE, b.FEE_TIME_INSURANCE) AS FEE_TIME_INSURANCE , NVL(fee.FEE_CALL, b.FEE_CALL) AS FEE_CALL
FROM RD_PROFIT cp LEFT JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER usr ON cp.mber_id = usr.mber_id LEFT JOIN RD_RIDER_FEE fee ON cp.COOPERATOR_ID = fee.COOPERATOR_ID AND cp.MBER_ID = fee.MBER_ID AND cp.RIDER_FEE_ID = fee.RIDER_FEE_ID LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_FEE b ON cp.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND cp.FEE_ID = b.FEE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND cp.profit_id = #{profitId}

SELECT a.GUBUN , case when a.gubun = 'C' then '콜수수료' when a.gubun ='E' then '기타수수료' when a.gubun ='D' then '선지급수수료' when a.gubun ='P' then '프로그램료' ELSE '' END GUBUN_NM , case when a.GUBUN = 'C' or a.GUBUN = 'P' then a.DELIVERY_COST when a.GUBUN = 'D' then b.SEND_PRICE ELSE 0 END cost , a.DELIVERY_CNT, a.DELIVERY_DAY FROM RD_PROFIT a LEFT JOIN RD_DAY_PAY b ON a.DYP_ID = b.DYP_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.profit_id = #{profitId}

SELECT a.COOPERATOR_ID, COOPERATOR_NM, REGISTRATION_SN, COMPANY_NM, REGISTRATION_NM, CEO_NM, a.USE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(b.CREAT_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS CREAT_DT, a.CREAT_ID, 'R' GUBUN , cp.FEE_ID, FEE_ADMINSTRATOR, FEE_COOPERATOR, FEE_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE, FEE_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE, FEE_WITHHOLDING_TAX, FEE_TIME_INSURANCE, FEE_CALL, FEE_COOPERATOR_CALL, FEE_PROGRAM FROM RD_COOPERATOR_PROFIT cp left join RD_COOPERATOR a ON cp.COOPERATOR_ID = a.COOPERATOR_ID LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_FEE b ON cp.fee_id = b.fee_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND cp.coofit_id = #{coofitId}

SELECT usr.mber_id, usr.mber_nm, usr.MBTLNUM , NVL(fee.FEE_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE, b.FEE_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE) AS FEE_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE , NVL(fee.FEE_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE, b.FEE_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE) AS FEE_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE , NVL(fee.FEE_WITHHOLDING_TAX, b.FEE_WITHHOLDING_TAX) AS FEE_WITHHOLDING_TAX , NVL(fee.FEE_TIME_INSURANCE, b.FEE_TIME_INSURANCE) AS FEE_TIME_INSURANCE , NVL(fee.FEE_CALL, b.FEE_CALL) AS FEE_CALL
FROM RD_COOPERATOR_PROFIT cp LEFT JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER usr ON cp.mber_id = usr.mber_id LEFT JOIN RD_RIDER_FEE fee ON cp.COOPERATOR_ID = fee.COOPERATOR_ID AND cp.MBER_ID = fee.MBER_ID AND cp.RIDER_FEE_ID = fee.RIDER_FEE_ID LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_FEE b ON cp.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND cp.FEE_ID = b.FEE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND cp.coofit_id = #{coofitId}

SELECT a.GUBUN , case when a.gubun = 'C' then '콜수수료' when a.gubun ='E' then '기타수수료' when a.gubun ='D' then '선지급수수료' ELSE '' END GUBUN_NM , case when a.GUBUN = 'C' then a.DELIVERY_COST when a.GUBUN = 'D' then b.SEND_PRICE ELSE 0 END cost , a.DELIVERY_CNT, a.DELIVERY_DAY FROM RD_COOPERATOR_PROFIT a LEFT JOIN RD_DAY_PAY b ON a.DYP_ID = b.DYP_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.coofit_id = #{coofitId}
